dataList.name: Sign of Roses
dataList.desc:
"What do you wish for?"

The Sign asks the sinners.

"A rose can bloom only when you clearly wish for something."

"The heavier your sins, the deeper the color of petals will be.

"See? Wish, wish for it. Knowing that it is a sin. Only then can you bloom such colorful roses."

"You have to bloom the roses. You want to escape this garden, don't you?"

"Let us... let me help you."

"Our only wish is that our garden will bloom full of flowers."

"Now, what will you do?"

result:
"Foolish."

"Everyone has wishes. To deny them is to deny yourself."

"I can see how… vivid your seeds are. To not allow them to bloom isn't fair."

"Well… That's too bad."

"If you have no wishes, then remain here forevermore."

"Until you realize that there is no moving on without acceptance."

"Be with us. With me."
